title: Teachers; provide $2,000 annual salary supplement to those employed in designated geographically critical teacher shortage area.
subject: Appropriations A
Education

extras.summary: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION 37-19-7, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, TO  PROVIDE THAT EFFECTIVE WITH THE 2026-2027 SCHOOL YEAR, ANY LICENSED TEACHER EMPLOYED IN A PUBLIC SCHOOL DISTRICT IN AN AREA DESIGNATED BY THE STATE BOARD OF EDUCATION AS A GEOGRAPHICALLY CRITICAL TEACHER SHORTAGE AREA SHALL RECEIVE AN ANNUAL SALARY SUPPLEMENT IN THE AMOUNT OF $2,000.00, TO PROVIDE THAT TEACHERS CURRENTLY RECEIVING AN ANNUAL SALARY SUPPLEMENT FOR NATIONAL BOARD CERTIFICATION SHALL NOT BE DISQUALIFIED FROM RECEIVING THE NEW $2,000.00 ANNUAL SALARY SUPPLEMENT; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
